about_the_game:
"Welcome to the immersive world of 'Maze Quest Master - Builder,' where an exhilarating adventure awaits. Step into intricate mazes where every twist and turn leads to new mysteries. Here, walls are not barriers but allies, guiding you on your quest.

"This DLC unlocks exciting new characters and level designs for your gaming experience!"

As you embark on this captivating journey, you'll need to hone your movement skills. Maneuvering through these labyrinths is an art, and you'll become a true master. Collecting coins is not just a task; it's a strategic challenge. Every decision counts as you strategically gather treasure while navigating this complex maze.

But it's not just about riches; it's about conquering the most challenging puzzles ever devised. Each corner of the labyrinth holds a new enigma waiting to be solved. Your wit and ingenuity will be put to the test as you decipher these intricate riddles.

Will you emerge as the ultimate explorer, having conquered the maze's every mystery? 'Maze Quest Master - Builder promises an enthralling adventure, where your skills and intellect are your greatest allies. Dare to take on the challenge and become the maze's triumphant conqueror!"

name: Maze Quest Master - Builder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 280 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Embark on a thrilling journey in 'Maze Quest Master - Builder.' Conquer intricate mazes, collect coins, and master wall-bound movement. Become the ultimate maze explorer!"
